sentences.english: The sink is broken in the one downstairs.

sentences.english: This article aims to analyze various processing methods for groundwater excavation of the foundation ditch in earthwork construction.

sentences.english: Sauced meat shop:Intestines and tripe are the favorite food for the people in the south.

sentences.english: The optimized sample of the aerator has been trial-produced and tested under the water.

sentences.english: As a kind of water resource, Groundwater is of great importance in Dezhou.

sentences.english: Studying on groundwater in Hebei Plain has been an academic focus all the time.
sentences.chinese: 河北平原地下水的研究一直以来都是学者关注的焦点。

sentences.english: It’s from the sewer and it’s called hogwash oil.
sentences.chinese: 来自下水道，也被称为地沟油。

sentences.english: compounding that, underpricing means it is often used for watering low-value crops.
sentences.chinese: 地下水的抑价说明其经常被用来灌溉低价值作物。

sentences.english: Ground waters originating in different beds commingle.
sentences.chinese: 来源于不同层位的地下水相互混合。

sentences.english: If you can't see the bottom, jump in, don't dive.
sentences.chinese: 如果水深不见底，跳进去时脚先落水，不要俯冲下水。
